snippet.title: Spin Rhythm XD 1.0 Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1058830/Spin_Rhythm_XD/

Leaving Early Access March 14, 2023.

Prepare to enter the Rhythm Dimension! We tried to make a spiritual successor to our favourite rhythm action games (Guitar Hero, Rock Band, DDR) with a modern aesthetic and soundtrack. 

Spin Rhythm XD is an electronic music rhythm game with smooth, analogue controls, stunning backgrounds and fully handmade levels. Spin, tap, flick and scratch through 60 incredible tunes across 5 difficulties. SRXD is heavily customisable and committed to accessibility.

Compatible with most MIDI DJ gear!
